Text:
Plot

Based on William Shakespeare's play, Romeo and Juliet, Gnomeo and Juliet features two garden gnomes in forbidden love and the gnomes comes to life. The couple looks to find lasting happiness and avoid tragedy as they are caught in the middle of a feud between blue and red-hatted garden gnomes.
